name: Auf Abwegen
description: Explore the beauty and dangers of nature in this narrative mini-puzzle-platformer - a one-man project from Kindman. Slip into the role of a red fox in its natural habitat - feed your family and survive the threats of the forest - and humans too!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel or AMD Dual Core CPU Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: 512 MB RAM DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 80 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel i5 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: 1 GB RAM DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 100 MB available space
